reviewText: The great actor Fernando Soler was great in his role in this romantic movie. Joaquin Cordero provided good complement to Soler and the lovely Ernestina Garfias sang and acted beautiful. Fernando Soto was funny and a good substitute for  the great Pardave. I am very happy I bought this classic mexican movie.

si su gusto es pasar un buen rato con peliculas de antano....les recomiendo esta..{MEXICO DE MIS RECUERDOS} Don Joaquin Pardave, que en paz descanse, siempre fue un exelente actor, tanto comico como en  tragedias y hace que sus companeros actores se vean bien en su actuacion por su grandisima labor y profesionalismo de actor...pasaran un buen rato marta

Two genius together: Mr. Pardave y Mr. Soler. This is a real jewel that reflect beautifully the old Mexican socialite. This is a lovely and naive part of history of Mexico at the ends of 1800's and 1910 on times of "Don Porfirio", the great general dictator of Mexico for 30 years!!!!
